text: David Robert Malpass (born March 8, 1956) is an American economic analyst and former government official. He was the President of the World Bank Group from 2019 to 2023. Malpass was Under Secretary of the Treasury for International Affairs under Donald Trump, Deputy Assistant Treasury Secretary under Ronald Reagan, Deputy Assistant Secretary of State under George H. W. Bush. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the World Bank Group Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Michigan Category:Businesspeople from Michigan Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: David Malpass
